workflow.name: Generate branded article images with GPT-4o, FAL Flux and Google Drive
workflow.description:
## üìÑ What this workflow does
This workflow automatically turns a topic and a reference image URL into a finished, branded article image. It uses GPT-4o to generate a short, detailed image prompt, sends it to FAL Flux image-to-image for rendering, polls until the job is completed, downloads and resizes the image, overlays your company logo, and finally saves the branded result into a specified Google Drive folder.

## üë§ Who is this for
Content teams who need consistent, on-brand article images.
Marketing teams looking to scale blog and landing page visuals.
Designers who want to automate repetitive resizing and branding tasks.
Anyone who needs a pipeline from topic ‚Üí AI illustration ‚Üí Google Drive asset.


## ‚úÖ Requirements
OpenAI (GPT-4o) API credentials (for image prompt generation).
FAL API key for Flux image-to-image generation.
Google Drive OAuth2 connection + target folder ID for saving images.
A company logo file/URL (direct download link from Google Drive or any public URL).


## ‚öôÔ∏è How to set up
Connect OpenAI GPT-4o in the ‚ÄúCreate prompt‚Äù node.
Add your FAL API key to all HTTP Request nodes (generate image, check image finish, Get image link).
Replace the logo link in ‚ÄúGet company‚Äôs logo‚Äù with your own logo URL.
Configure the Google Drive node with your OAuth2 credentials and set the correct Folder ID.
Update the image_url in ‚ÄúLink image‚Äù (or pass from upstream data).
Test the workflow end-to-end with a sample subject and image.


## üîÅ How it works
Form/Manual Trigger ‚Üí Input subject + reference image URL.
GPT-4o ‚Üí Generates a <70-word sharp/detailed prompt (no text/logos).
FAL Flux (HTTP Request) ‚Üí Submits job for image-to-image generation.
Polling Loop ‚Üí Wait + check status until COMPLETED.
Download Image ‚Üí Retrieves generated image link.
Resize Image ‚Üí Standardize to 800√ó500 pixels.
Get & Resize Logo ‚Üí Fetch company logo, resize for branding.
Composite ‚Üí Overlay logo onto article image.
Save to Google Drive ‚Üí Final branded image saved in target folder.


## üí° About Margin AI
[Margin AI](https://marginai.co/) is your AI Service Companion. We help organizations design intelligent, human-centric automation ‚Äî from content pipelines and branding workflows to customer insights and sales enablement. Our tailored AI solutions scale marketing, operations, and creative processes with ease.

parameters.content:
## Workflow Overview
- **Input:** topic (`subject`) and a reference `image_url`.
- **Prompting:** GPT-4o creates a <70-word, ‚Äúno text/logo‚Äù> prompt for the image model.
- **Generation:** HTTP Request ‚Üí FAL Flux (`/image-to-image`) queues a job and returns `request_id`.
- **Polling:** `Wait` + `check image finish` loop until `status == COMPLETED`.
- **Post-process:** Download the image ‚Üí resize to **800√ó500** ‚Üí download logo ‚Üí resize logo ‚Üí composite.
- **Output:** Save the final image to **Google Drive** with a dynamic file name.

## Setup Checklist
- **OpenAI / GPT-4o:** Connect your OpenAI credentials in the ‚ÄúCreate prompt for generate image‚Äù node.
- **FAL API Keys:** Put real keys in BOTH HTTP Request nodes:
  - `generate image` (POST ‚Ä¶/image-to-image)
  - `check image finish` & `Get image link` (GET ‚Ä¶/requests/{id}[ /status ])
- **Logo Source:** Update the logo URL in **‚ÄúGet company's logo‚Äù** (Google Drive direct download link or any public URL).
- **Google Drive:** Connect OAuth2 and set the **Folder ID** in **‚ÄúSave on drive‚Äù**.
- **Filename:** The Drive node uses: `$('Loop Over Items').first().json.ten` ‚Üí change to your desired name field.
- **Reference Image:** Update `image_url` in **‚ÄúLink image‚Äù** (or pass it from upstream data).

## Notes & Tips
- **Branding:** `resize logo` and the **Composite** node place the logo at `positionX: 728`. Tweak size/position for your layout.
- **Polling Interval:** `Wait` node amount is **2** (seconds). Increase if you hit rate limits; decrease for faster checks.
- **Safety:** The GPT prompt enforces **no text/logos** in the generated image‚Äîkeep this to avoid artifacts.
- **Dimensions:** Final canvas is **800√ó500** (web article hero size). Adjust in `resize image` if your site uses a different aspect ratio.
- **Error Handling:** If status never becomes `COMPLETED`, add an `If` branch for timeouts or retries.

user.name: Cong Nguyen
user.bio: I‚Äôm a developer specialized in building web and mobile applications with AI integration and intelligent automation. With a solid background in data science, I help businesses build smarter digital solutions using cutting-edge technologies.

data.details:
The Edit Image node allows you to manipulate and edit images. Use this node when you want to:

- Blur an image
- Add a border to an image
- Create a new image
- Crop an image
- Composite an image on top of another
- Draw on an image
- Get information about the image
- Rotate an image
- Change the size of an image
- Shear an image along the X or Y axis
- Add text to the image

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
